name: I Need A Sleep
description:
You have to wake up at 7:00 but your neighbors don't let you sleep. Try to make them shut up by screaming and throwing everything that you can find.

-CONTROLS-

E: Use

F: Hold item

Left Mouse Button: Throw item

Right Mouse Button: Scream

The game made in 72 hours at #LudumDare37

Click here for the Ludum Dare page.
